motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • April 25, 2022, City Council meeting minutes • Contract approval for installation of restroom facility at Waterford Park subject to final legal review

motions.title: American Rescue Plan – Grant for After School Programs – Summer 2022
motions.description: Approval of ARP grant for after school programs with Corners Outreach as only applicant. City to provide vouchers for 175 enrolled students at $784 per student ($137,200 total), with additional funding up to $200,000 total for students above 175.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for the purpose of personnel, legal, and real estate discussion.

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Officer Christian Dobbins
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch administered the Oath of Office to Officer Christian Dobbins.

discussionItems.title: Amendment to the Public Art Ordinance
discussionItems.description: Amendment to remove required themes and required easement from Public Art ordinance.
